rukus.text: atu urukkappatta cempu pol irukkum; vayirukalil atu kotikkum
avanaippitittuk koluntu vitteriyum narakattin maiyattirku iluttuc cellunkal
Pinnar, avanatu talaikku mel vetanai kotukkum kotikkum nirai urrunkal
ni (itaic) cuvaittuppar! Niccayamaka ni vallamai caliyakavum, cankaiyutaiyavanakavum iruntay
niccayamaka itutan ninkal cantekittuk kontiruntirkale atuvakum" (enru avarkalitam collappatum)
suntus, istaprak (akiya alakiya pattataikal, pitamparankal) anintu oruvarai oruvar mukam nokki irupparkal
ivvare (anku nataiperum) melum avarkalukku hurul inkalai nam mana mutittu vaippom
accamarravarkalaka, cakala vitakkanivakaikalaiyum, anku kettu(p perruk) kontumirupparkal
muntiya maranattait tavira, anku maranattai avarkal anupavikkamattarkal; melum (iraivan) avarkalai narakattin vetanaiyai vittum kapparrivittan
(ituve) um'mutaiya iraivanin arul kotaiyum; ituve mikap periya verriyamakum
avarkal (arintu) nallupatecam peruvatarkaka, itai nam um'mutaiya moliyil elitakkinom
akave, nirum etirparppiraka! Avarkalum etirparttuk kontutan irukkirarkal
